JUST IN: An Ethereum transaction incurred an unusual fee of 288 ETH ($700,000) due to a validator withdrawal exploit, prompting on-chain researchers to suspect hacking and seek to return the funds to the original owner.

RECENTLY: CoinGecko revealed the speaker lineup for GeckoCon 2024, featuring Web3 gaming experts like Alena Shmalko (TON Foundation), Beryl Li (Yield Guild Games), and John Linden (Mythical Games) in Bangkok, Thailand.
📊 JUST IN : Bitcoin hits $61,000

#BTC Main 01.10.2024📊

BTC: $ 63,900
ETH: $ 2,600
BITCOIN DOMINANCE 57.17% 
TOTAL MARKET CAP $ 2.21
Crypto Fear & Greed Index: 50

📊There have been no significant changes in the market since yesterday. BTC is trading in the range of +-1000$, but the altcoins feels very good against the background of BTC and shows good movements. There will be a market update today and I think I will share new trends with you.

Have a good trading day👌
RECENTLY: A wallet linked to Vitalik Buterin sold over $3 million in Ether after receiving 1,300 ETH from his other wallet, with the latest transfer of 649 ETH to Paxos reported on Sept. 30.
